item.description:
How could the quintessential geeky Bugs and Elmer couple not host a meetup for the Bugs Bunny Film Festival?  I will not come in costume...well maybe I will bring the ears...also, maybe I can talk John into wearing the hat.  :)  

Come and join in the fun.   We will be at the Brattle around 4:45, outside by the ticket booth until they let us in the lobby.   We will head in for seats as soon as they let us, probably around 5:15. 

If you miss the group beforehand, come find us after...we will congregate outside the theater on the sidewalk.  If people are interested, we can go out for drinks and a bite to eat after somewhere in the square.

I strongly recommend you buy tickets ahead of time, it is Presidents Day after all and what better way to celebrate a work holiday than to giggle at Bugs and his zany group of Looney Tunes Friends.

To buy tickets to the Monday Night 5:30 show

The best way to get to the Brattle is to take the T.   However, since it is a Holiday, meters and residential parking will not be enforced, so you can park for free.   Doesn't mean you will be able to find a spot though.  

Parking/Direction Information

 

Brattle Event Description:

A school vacation treat for kids and fun-loving adults alike, the Brattle’s BUGS BUNNY FILM FESTIVAL has been delighting audiences for well over a decade! Since 2012 marks the 100th birthday of the indispensable Chuck Jones, creator and director of some of the most beloved Looney Tunes, we’re offering two different programs of ALL Chuck Jones ‘toons this year. As usual our first program is the ALL BUGS REVUE, starring everyone’s favorite wascally wabbit. The second program CHUCK JONES GOES LOONEY features the rest of the Looney Tunes in some of Jones’ best shorts! We round out the second weekend with special matinees of a LOONEY TUNES REVUE featuring a completely different program and a few surprises!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. I will be outside the theater by the ticket booth until they let us in the lobby. The group will head in for seats by 5:15.
item.name: Bugs Bunny Film Festival: Chuck Jones Goes Looney
